ModMetaData.name: RePower EPOE Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Ykara's Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering workbenches for using the RePower system:
Simple Prosthetics Workbench (10W Idle, 650W Active) Bionic Workbench (10W Idle, 1500W Active) Tissue Printer (10W Idle, 1000W Active)
